artist: Delineator: Sylvester Harding; Engraver: Edward Harding
description: half length portrait turned left, head turned right and looking right; hands appear to be clapping
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black:  S. Harding del.   E. Harding sc. / Robert Williams / From an Original drawing in the collection of / R. BULL ESQ\'R / Pub\'d 1 Octr 1796 by E & S Harding Pall Mall
title: Robert Williams
